entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Design for exhanced refactoring UX #59352
  • Proposed changes to our source distributed NuPkg files #59349
  • Typing <enter> in single-line raw string literal should convert it to multiline. #59347
  • c# formatting constructor spacing not consistent #59338
  • Incorrect IDE0007: Use 'var' instead of explicit type when the type implements multiple instantiations of a generic interface which influence overload resolution #59337
  • "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 ("CompilerServer: server failed [...] Reached end of stream before end of read.") #59336
  • Namespace segments are clickable inside hovers but they lead to nowhere #59335
  • Fade out method calls with [Conditional] when constant is not defined #59334

Closed

  • GetHashCode() quick action does not respect 'var' preferences #40653
    Backlog
  • 'left' and 'right' in generated equality operators should be nullable. #40053
    Backlog
  • Improve IDE0046 to not report when in a else if chain #59135
    Backlog
  • Autocomplete of summary fails when cursor is placed in multiple spots. #54391
    Next
  • Heavy allocation in formatting an unused error message #58165
    17.1
  • Malwarebytes puts nodejs in quarantine and that affects the JavaScript experience in VS2022/2019 #59331
  • Roslyn projects failing to build in source-build bootstrap build #57342
    17.2
  • FindAllReferences should find usages of positional members #44559
    17.2
  • Unused usings feature does not deal with trivia correctly #1322
    Backlog
  • Quick-fixes which insert #pragma warning disable XXXX are incompatible with previous versions #1130
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Associate 'Generate GetHashCode' with a span #59354
    Area-IDE
  • Fixup add-using-statement to preserve comments properly in VB. #59353
    Area-IDE
  • Finalize New Inline Rename UI #59351
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move net450 targets to net462 #59350
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support embedded languages in raw strings. #59348
    Area-IDE
  • Backport diagnostics error list property for liveshare to 16.11 #59344
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Support the StringSyntax attribute actually being used on an attribute parameter. #59343
    Area-IDE
  • Add repo files to Roslyn.sln and Compilers.sln as solution items #59328
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add FindUsagesOptions and thread option getter through FAR services #59306
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Suppress unsupported transitive dependencies #59342
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Support multi-caret when inserting doc comments #54741
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Use interpolated string handler for Contract.ThrowIf methods #58173
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59346
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Stop LOC updates to 17.0 servicing branch. #59345
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid 0-length spans #59299
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59339
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #59327
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Cascade between position record parameters and properties. #59293
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix fading span for unnecessary using #59276
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ensure command handler doesn't index out of bounds when at end of file #59302
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove netstandard1.3 from code base #59177
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Validate Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections.Package on net6.0 #59187
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59355
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServieHub project - take 3 #59316
    Area-IDE
  • Fix definite assignment crash with list-patterns #59285
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Cache the unescaped form of globalconfig section names #59301
    Area-Compilers
  • Add CompilerGeneratedAttribute to record members #58542
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Records
  • Safely create VirtualCharSequence from string in StackFrameParser #59283
    Area-IDE
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • More fault handling cleanup #59097
    Area-IDE
  • Save and restore '_factory.Syntax' in LocalRewriter methods #59236
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Respect ReportSuppressedDiagnostics option for DiagnosticSuppressor #53045
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add support for unsafe local functions in IDE0062 code fix #59297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add prefer trailing commas code-style option #54859
    Area-IDE
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove some outdated configurations in tools #52800
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Handle more cases in both new line formatting and curly brace completion #53222
    Area-IDE, Community
